docs.summary: The wix-bookings-backend module contains functionality for working with bookings from backend code.
description: The wix-bookings-backend API allows you to manage bookings and calendar functionality on your site.
To enable bookings backend API functionality for your site, add the [Wix Bookings](https://support.wix.com/en/article/adding-wix-bookings-to-your-site) application to your site.

You must upgrade your site to a [Premium Plan](https://support.wix.com/en/article/upgrading-your-site-to-premium-3066683) in order to accept bookings and receive online payments. To accept payments, see [About Accepting Payments](https://support.wix.com/en/article/accepting-payments-on-your-wix-site-7014346).
The following objects are maintained by the wix-bookings-backend API:
|Object|Description|Relationships
|[`Bookings`](wix-bookings-backend.Bookings/introduction)| An order placed by a customer for a service or series of services.|Books a service's schedule. Has sessions.
|[`Resources`](wix-bookings-backend.resources/introduction)| A business asset like a staff member, a room, or equipment needed to provide a service.|Owns a schedule.

|[`Schedule`](wix-bookings-backend.sessions/introduction#wix-bookings-backend.sessions_introduction_schedules)| A collection of sessions and the information needed to calculate availability.|Owned by a resource or service. Has sessions.

|[`Sessions`](wix-bookings-backend.sessions/introduction) | A reserved period of time for an appointment, class, or course, or a period of availability for a resource. |Belongs to a resource or service via a schedule.
For each object, the wix-bookings-backend API provides the following functionality:
+ [Bookings](wix-bookings-backend.Bookings/introduction)
+ List and [query](wix-bookings-backend.Bookings/querybookings) booking information.
+ [Confirm](wix-bookings-backend.Bookings/confirmbooking) pending booking requests.
+ [Decline](wix-bookings-backend.Bookings/declinebooking) pending booking requests.
+ [Cancel](wix-bookings-backend.Bookings/cancelbooking) bookings.
+ [Set attendance](wix-bookings-backend.Bookings/setattendance) for booked sessions.
+ [Mark](wix-bookings-backend.Bookings/setbookingaspaid) a bookings as paid.
+ Update the customer's [booking information](wix-bookings-backend.Bookings/updatecustomerinfo).
+ [Resources](wix-bookings-backend.resources/introduction)
+ [Create](wix-bookings-backend.resources/createresource) resources and schedules.
+ [Update](wix-bookings-backend.resources/updateresource) resource details.
+ [Update ](wix-bookings-backend.resources/updateresourceschedule) resource schedule information.
+ [Delete](wix-bookings-backend.resources/deleteresource) resources.
+ [Query](wix-bookings-backend.resources/queryresourcecatalog) the resource catalog.
+ [Sessions](wix-bookings-backend.sessions/introduction)
+ [Create](wix-bookings-backend.sessions/createsession) sessions for a resource.
+ [Get](wix-bookings-backend.sessions/getsession) session information.
+ [Update](wix-bookings-backend.sessions/updatesession) session details.
+ [Delete](wix-bookings-backend.sessions/deletesession) sessions.
+ [Query](wix-bookings-backend.sessions/updatesession) session information.

>**Note:** You cannot book a service in preview mode, or when logged in as the site owner. To make a booking, publish your site, then either log out of your Wix account, or open the published site in an incognito browser window.

docs.summary: The Bookings API provides functionality for updating and managing bookings created in the Wix Bookings app.
The Resources API provides functionality for creating and managing wix-bookings resources.
The Bookings API provides functionality for creating and managing wix-bookings sessions.
Custom [address](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/$w/addressinput/value), used when location_type is `"OWNER_CUSTOM"`.

members.name: formatted

members.doc: Main address line, usually street and number, as free text.

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains Apt, Suite, and Floor.

members.doc: Street name, number and apartment number.

members.name: subdivision

members.name: country
members.doc: Country code.

members.name: postalCode
members.doc: Zip/postal code.

docs.summary: Attendance information.

members.name: attendanceStatus
members.doc: Whether the booked contact attended the session.

members.name: numberOfAttendees
members.doc: Number of attendees that attended the session. This can be more than 1 if `formInfo.paymentSelection.numberOfParticipants` for the booking is greater than 1.

docs.summary: Attendance information.

members.name: attendanceStatus
members.doc: Whether the booked contact attended the session.

members.name: numberOfAttendees
members.doc: Number of attendees that attended the session. This can be greater than 1 when the booking is made for a group of people.

docs.summary: The final price, currency, down payment, and amount received.

members.name: finalPrice
members.doc: Required payment amount, currency, and any down payment required.

members.name: amountReceived
members.doc: Current total amount paid.

docs.summary: An object describing the entity that was booked.

members.name: rate
members.doc: Price options offered to book this session at the time of booking.

members.name: location
members.doc: Location of the session.

members.name: tags
members.doc: List of tags for the booking.

members.name: scheduleId
members.doc: ID of the booked schedule.

members.name: title
members.doc: Session title at the time of booking.

members.name: singleSession
members.doc: Start and end time of the booked sessions.

members.name: setOfSessions
members.doc: First start and last end time of the booked sessions.

members.name: serviceId
members.doc: ID of the booked service.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Booked resource ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Resource's name at the time of booking.

members.name: email
members.doc: Resource's email at the time of booking.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Booking ID.

members.name: bookedEntity
members.doc: An object describing the entity that was booked.

members.name: bookedResources
members.doc: List of booked resources. Currently, only one is supported. The booked resource would be the staff-member giving the session.

members.name: formInfo
members.doc: Form information submitted when booking. FormInfo contains contact details, participants, and other form fields, set up for the service.

members.name: paymentDetails
members.doc: Payment Details.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Booking status.
<!--ONLY:VELO-->
 One of:
 - `"PENDING_CHECKOUT"` The booking is waiting to be checked out.
 - `"CONFIRMED"` The booking has beed approved by the owner.
 - `"CANCELED"` The booking has been canceled.
 - `"PENDING"` The booking has been created.
 - `"PENDING_APPROVAL"` The booking is waiting for the owner to approve or decline.
 - `"DECLINED"` The booking was declined by the owner.
<!--END:ONLY:VELO-->

members.name: attendanceInfo
members.doc: Attendance information.

members.name: bookingSource
members.doc: An object describing the platform and application that made the booking.

members.name: externalUserId
members.doc: External ID provided by the client app on creation.

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the booking was created.

docs.summary: An object describing the platform and application that made the booking.

members.name: platform

Platform from which a booking was created

 - `"MOBILE_APP"` Mobile application.
<!--END:ONLY:VELO-->

members.name: actor
members.doc:
Actor that created this booking.
<!--ONLY:VELO-->
One of:

members.name: appDefId
members.doc: Wix site ID of the application that created this booking.

members.name: appName
members.doc: Name of the application that created this booking, as saved in Wix-dev-center at the time of booking.

docs.summary: An object describing the business location.
description: Valid when `locationType` is `"OWNER_BUSINESS"`. Defaults to the business's default location.

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of the location.

members.name: name
members.doc: Display name of the location.

members.name: description
members.doc: Free text describing the location.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Status of the location. Default is `"ACTIVE"`.
One of:
 + `"ACTIVE"`
 + `"IN_ACTIVE"`

members.name: locationType
members.doc:
Type of the location.
One of:
 + `"UNKNOWN"`
 + `"BRANCH"`
 + `"OFFICES"`
 + `"RECEPTION"`
 + `"HEADQUARTERS"`

members.name: fax
members.doc: Fax number.

members.name: timeZone
members.doc: Time zone.

members.name: email
members.doc: Email address.

members.name: phone
members.doc: Phone number.

members.name: address
members.doc: Address.

members.name: revision
members.doc: Location revision, represents the number of changes to the location.

members.name: archived
members.doc:
Whether the location is archived.
Archived locations can't be updated.

members.name: default
members.doc:
Whether this is the default location.
There can only be one default location per site. Changes to the default location are made on the **Site Properties** page of the dashboard.
The default location can't be deleted.

docs.summary: Represents the time periods that this location is open for business. Holds a collection of TimePeriod instances.
description: TimePeriod indicates when the location is open. Each period represents a range of hours when the location is
open during the week. Limited to 100 time periods.

members.name: periods
members.doc:
Times that this location is open. Each period represents a range of hours when the location is.
open during the week. Limited to 100 time periods.

members.name: specialHourPeriod
members.doc: Exceptions to the business's regular hours.

open during the week. Limited to 100 time periods.

members.name: periods
members.doc:
Times that this location is open. Each period represents a range of hours when the location is
open during the week. Limited to 100 time periods.

members.name: specialHourPeriod
members.doc: Exceptions to the business's regular hours.

docs.summary: An object specifying the start date and time of the session. If the session is a recurring session, `start` must contain a `localDateTime`.

members.name: timestamp
members.doc:
UTC date-time in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Coordinated_Universal_Time_(UTC)) format. If a timezone offset is specified, the time is converted to UTC. For example, if you specify  `new Date('2021-01-06T16:00:00.000-07:00')`, the stored value will be `"2021-01-06T23:00:00.000Z"`.
Required if `localDateTime` is not specified.
If `localDateTime` is specified, `timestamp` is calculated as `localDateTime`, using the business's timezone.

members.name: localDateTime
members.doc: An object containing the local date and time for the business's timezone.

docs.summary: An object specifying the start date and time of the session. If the session is a recurring session, `start` must contain a `localDateTime`.

members.name: timestamp
members.doc:
UTC date-time in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Coordinated_Universal_Time_(UTC)) format. If a timezone offset is specified, the time is converted to UTC. For example, if you specify  `new Date('2021-01-06T16:00:00.000-07:00')`, the stored value will be `"2021-01-06T23:00:00.000Z"`.
Required if `localDateTime` is not specified.
If `localDateTime` is specified, `timestamp` is calculated as `localDateTime`, using the business's timezone.

members.name: localDateTime
members.doc: An object containing the local date and time for the business's timezone.

docs.summary: The location of the session.

members.name: locationType
members.doc:
Location type.
<!--ONLY:VELO-->
 One of:
 - `"OWNER_BUSINESS"` The business address as set in the site’s general settings.
 - `"OWNER_CUSTOM"` The address as set when creating the service.
 - `"CUSTOM"` The address set for the individual session.
<!--END:ONLY:VELO-->

members.name: businessLocation
members.doc:
An object describing the business location.
Valid when `locationType` is `"OWNER_BUSINESS"`. Defaults to the business's default location.

members.name: customAddress
members.doc: Custom [address](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/$w/addressinput/value), used when location_type is `"OWNER_CUSTOM"`.

docs.summary: Geographic location of the session as free-form text. Optional.
description: The default value is the location in the schedule.
For single sessions, `session.location.businessLocation` can only be provided for locations which were defined in the schedule (`schedule.location` or `schedule.availability.locations`)

members.name: locationType
members.doc:
Location type.
One of:
 + `"OWNER_BUSINESS"` The business address as set by the owner in the site’s general settings.
 + `"OWNER_CUSTOM"` The address as set by owner when creating the service.
 + `"CUSTOM"` The address as set for the individual session.

members.name: address
members.doc: Free text address used when location_type is `OWNER_CUSTOM`.

members.name: businessLocation
members.doc:
Currently not supported.
 Valid when locationType is `"OWNER_BUSINESS"` and defaults to the default business location.
 When used, businessLocation._id is required.
 Supported read only fields: name, description, timezone, email, phone, address.

docs.summary: Not supported yet.
description: Valid only when location_type is OWNER_BUSINESS.
If the location_type is OWNER_BUSINESS the default value is the default business location.
business_location.id is required.
Supported read only fields: name, description, timezone, email, phone, address.

members.name: name
members.doc: Display name of the location.

members.name: description
members.doc: Free text to better describe the location.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Status of the location. Active by default.
One of:
 + `"ACTIVE"`
 + `"IN_ACTIVE"`

members.name: locationType
members.doc:
Type of the location.
One of:
 + `"UNKNOWN"`
 + `"BRANCH"`
 + `"OFFICES"`
 + `"RECEPTION"`
 + `"HEADQUARTERS"`

members.name: fax
members.doc: Fax number.

members.doc: Time zone.

members.name: email
members.doc: Email address.

members.name: phone
members.doc: Phone number.

members.name: address
members.doc: Address.

members.name: businessSchedule
members.doc:
Represents the time periods that this location is open for business. Holds a collection of TimePeriod instances.
TimePeriod indicates when the location is open. Each period represents a range of hours when the location is open during the week. Limited to 100 time periods.

members.name: revision
members.doc: Location revision, represent the number of changes on the location.

docs.summary: Whether to notify the participants about the booking confirmation, and an optional custom message.

members.doc: Whether to notify participants about the change.

docs.summary: Payment Details.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Checkout ID.

members.name: balance
members.doc: Final price, currency, down payment, and amount received.

members.name: couponDetails
members.doc: Coupon details, if a coupon was used to pay for the booking.

members.name: state
members.doc:
Checkout current state.
<!--ONLY:VELO-->
 One of:
 - `"COMPLETE"` Amount paid in full.
 - `"PENDING_CASHIER"` An online payment is in progress and awaiting a response.
 - `"REJECTED"` The checkout request was rejected by the online payment process. 
 - `"READY"` All online checkout requirements were met. For example, when the service uses pay in person, or a partial or down payment was paid online.
 - `"CANCELED"`  Checkout canceled.
 - `"REFUNDED"` When using Pricing Plans, if the booking was canceled, it will be automatically refunded.
 - `"PENDING_MERCHANT"` An online payment was made, but the owner has not set up the necessary details.
 - `"WIX_PAY_FAILURE"` Online payment failure.
 - `"PENDING_MARK_AS_PAID"` Offline transaction. The transaction will be complete when explicitly marked as paid.
 - `"PENDING_BUYER"`  The transaction started, but is waiting for confirmation on the buyer's side. This can be due to credit or fraud checking on the provider's side, a long bank transfer, or similar processes.
<!--END:ONLY:VELO-->

members.name: wixPayMultipleDetails

docs.summary: Price options offered to book this session at the time of booking.

members.name: labeledPriceOptions
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs.Mapping between a named price option, for example, adult or child prices, and the price, currency, and down payment amount.

members.name: priceText
members.doc: Textual price information used when **Price Per Session** is set to **Custom Price** in the app's service details page.

docs.summary: The price options offered to participate this session. Optional. The default value is the schedule rate.
description: If the recurrence field is given, the value is read only and inherited from the schedule.

members.name: labeledPriceOptions
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs.Mapping between a named price option and the price, currency and down payment amount.

members.name: priceText
members.doc: Textual price information used when Price Per Session is set to Custom Price in the app's service details page.

members.name: participantNotification
members.doc: Whether to notify the participants about the booking confirmation, and an optional custom message.

members.name: ignoreReschedulePolicy
members.doc: Sets the reschedule flow behavior, some behaviors required permissions.

docs.summary: Sets the reschedule flow behavior, some behaviors required permissions.

members.name: ignoreReschedulePolicy
members.doc:
when defined as true, skips the service defined reschedule policy.
 required BOOKINGS.IGNORE_BOOKING_POLICY permission.

docs.summary: Resource details.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Resource ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Resource name.

members.name: email
members.doc: Resource email address.

members.name: phone
members.doc: Resource phone number.

members.name: description
members.doc: Resource description.

members.name: tags
members.doc: Resource tags. Tags are used to identify, group, and filter the different types of resources. For example, 'staff' or 'room'.

members.name: scheduleIds
members.doc: List of IDs of schedules owned by this resource.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Resource status.
<!--ONLY:VELO-->
 One of:
 - `"CREATED"` Default status.
 - `"DELETED"` The resource was deleted.
 - `"UPDATED"` The resource was updated.
<!--END:ONLY:VELO-->

docs.summary: First start and last end time of the booked sessions.

members.name: firstSessionStart
members.doc: Start time of the first session.

members.name: lastSessionEnd
members.doc: End time of the last session.

docs.summary: Start and end time of the booked sessions.

members.name: start
members.doc: Start time of the session.

members.name: end
members.doc: End time of the session.

docs.summary: Set of time periods when a location's operational hours differ from its normal business hours.

members.name: startDate
members.doc: Date and Time in 24hr [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) Coordinated universal time (UTC).

members.name: endDate
members.doc: Date and Time in 24hr [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) Coordinated universal time (UTC).

members.name: isClosed
members.doc: Whether the business is closed during this period.

members.name: comment
members.doc: Comment.

members.name: startDate

members.name: endDate
members.doc: Date and Time in 24hr iso-8601 Coordinated universal time (UTC).

members.name: isClosed
members.doc: Whether the business is closed during this period.

members.name: comment
members.doc: Comment text.

members.doc: Apartment number.

docs.summary: Street name, number and apartment number.

members.name: number
members.doc: Street number.

members.name: name
members.doc: Street name.

members.name: apt
members.doc: Apartment number.

members.name: code
members.doc: Subdivision code. Usually state, region, prefecture or province code, according to [ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2).

members.name: name
members.doc: Subdivision full name.

docs.summary: A span of time that the business is open.
description: starting on the specified open day/time and closing on the specified close day/time.
Closing time must occur after the opening time, for example later in the same day, or on a subsequent day.

members.name: openDay
members.doc:
Day of the week this period starts on.
One of:
 + `"MONDAY"`
 + `"TUESDAY"`
 + `"WEDNESDAY"`
 + `"THURSDAY"`
 + `"FRIDAY"`
 + `"SATURDAY"`
 + `"SUNDAY"`

members.name: openTime
members.doc:
Time in 24hr [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) extended format (hh:mm). Valid values are 00:00-24:00, where 24:00 represents
midnight at the end of the specified day field.

members.name: closeDay
members.doc:
Day of the week this period ends on.
One of:
 + `"MONDAY"`
 + `"TUESDAY"`
 + `"WEDNESDAY"`
 + `"THURSDAY"`
 + `"FRIDAY"`
 + `"SATURDAY"`
 + `"SUNDAY"`

members.name: closeTime
members.doc:
Time in 24hr [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) extended format (hh:mm). Valid values are 00:00-24:00, where 24:00 represents
midnight at the end of the specified day field.

docs.summary: A span of time that the business is open.
description: starting on the specified open day/time and closing on the specified close day/time.
Closing time must occur after the opening time, for example later in the same day, or on a subsequent day.

members.name: openDay
members.doc:
Day of the week this period starts on.
One of:
 + `"MONDAY"`
 + `"TUESDAY"`
 + `"WEDNESDAY"`
 + `"THURSDAY"`
 + `"FRIDAY"`

Time in 24hr [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) extended format (hh:mm). Valid values are 00:00-24:00, where 24:00 represents

One of:

members.name: txId
members.doc: Wix Pay payment transaction ID.

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Wix Pay payment order ID.

members.name: orderAmount
members.doc: Order amount sent to the Wix Pay system.

members.name: orderStatus
members.doc:
Transaction status
<!--ONLY:VELO-->
 One of:
 - `"CREATED"`  The transaction has been started.
 - `"PENDING_MERCHANT"` An online payment was made, but the owner has not set up the necessary details.
 - `"COMPLETE"`  The current part of the payment was completed.
 - `"FAILED"`  The Wix online payment system is unavailable or failed processing.
 - `"DECLINED"` The payment was declined.
 - `"PENDING_MARK_AS_PAID"` Offline transaction. The transaction will be complete when explicitly marked as paid.
 - `"CANCELED"` The transaction was canceled.
<!--END:ONLY:VELO-->

members.name: orderApprovalTime
members.doc: Date and time that the order was approved.

members.name: paymentVendorName
members.doc: Payment vendor name. The company processing the payment, such as Pay Pal or a credit card company. `inPerson` is used for cash payments.
